about_the_game:
Nova Rally is the ultimate party racer, supporting up to 24 players in local or online play via streaming. Assume the role of a pit manager and command your race team, combining stats-based racing with real-time decisions to secure victory!

Key Features

Stat-Based Racing

  • Unique Characters & Vehicles
    Each driver and ride boasts distinct stats that influence their performance on the track. Exploit these differences to get an edge in tight corners, straightaways, and risky overtakes.

  • Strategic Customization
    Mix and match characters, vehicles, and weapons to craft unstoppable racing teams. Adapt to various track layouts, develop your own signature tactics, and watch your perfectly orchestrated plans unfold.

Dynamic Camera System

  • Real-Time Highlights
    Follow every nail-biting duel, dramatic overtake attempt, and epic collision with our fully dynamic camera. Feel the adrenaline as drivers go wheel-to-wheel—and sometimes face-first into a mountain!

Massive Multiplayer Mayhem

  • Team Ownership & Decision-Making
    Vote on key strategy points like driver selections, vehicle maintenance, and the acquisition of powerful new weapons.

  • Weekly Seasons & Live Broadcasts
    Compete in fast-paced seasons broadcast live on Twitch. Rally fans around the globe can cheer (or jeer) as your carefully laid plans unfold lap by lap. STREAMER FRIENDLY!!

Seamless Accessibility

  • Play Anywhere—Even on Your Phone
    Join the action from your mobile device, whether you’re together in the same room or connecting online. No extra controllers required—just use your phone as your steering wheel and get straight into the race.

  • Nova Rally Hub
    Stay on top of daily quests, track race data, and manage your team’s progress with our fully featured online hub. Log in to fine-tune your strategy, check standings, and gear up for the next big event—anytime, anywhere!

Get behind the scenes and onto the track with Nova Rally—the chaos-fuelled, stats-driven party racer that blends strategic depth, outrageous action, and the thrill of live competition. Will you steer your team to the top of the podium, or crash out in spectacular fashion? The choice is yours!
